company.name: WIGeoGIS GmbH
company.description:
WIGeoGIS is one of the leading European companies for Geomarketing, WebGIS and GIS software development, as well as Geocoding. WIGeoGIS has been linking company data with market data and geodata since 1993 in Geographic Information Systems (GIS) - both as a consultant and as an integrator of software solutions. Our core competence also includes exact, precise geocoding. 

WIGeoGIS supports 400 clients, mainly in Austria, Germany and Switzerland. Currently, WIGeoGIS employs 40 people at their sites in Vienna and Munich.

The WIGeoGIS consultants develop market, location and potential analyses. They support companies in numerous aspects of strategic management, sales and marketing.

GIS specialists develop individual map solutions tailored to the requirements of the client, both with commercial GIS software and open source components – compatible with current operating systems, databases and business software products. These are GIS desktop solutions or web applications. The web GIS runs also as a mobile GIS (WebApp) on various devices.

WIGeoGIS stands for:
•	Economic geography
•	Geomarketing consultancy, analysis and training
•	Development of innovative and customisable web GIS, mobile GIS and GIS software (geographical
        information systems) and solutions
•	Geodata and current market data
•	Geodata enhancement
•	Geocoding
•	Long-term project and integration experience
•	Implementation of geographical information systems for company-wide application, even in international
        companies

WIGeoGIS offers you a complete product and service range in the sector of geomarketing and GIS:
•	Web GIS: WIGeoGIS
•	Mobile GIS: WIGeoWeb mobile
•	GIS software for geomarketing and GIS experts / Extensions for ArcGIS (Esri)
•	Branch finder: Nextdoor
•	Geodata: WIGeoStreet, TomTom products, Bing Maps
•	Market data​: Population data, purchasing power data, company data 
•	Geomarketing analysis as a consultancy service
